title: Textile, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: painted and glazed on plain weave
description: Painted and glazed cloth strip depicting scenes from a Hindu religious epic. Shows rows of standing and kneeling figures against stylized cloud bands on undyed cotton ground. Flowering sprays and simple landscape conventions at intervals. Freely drawn in black ink; colored with varitey of bright opaque water colors.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, early 20th century.
early 20th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: painted and glazed on plain weave. Gift of Frances Morris. 1951-111-24-d.
